title: Lamar Jackson, Terrell Owens, Ezekiel Elliott, & the NFl helmet rule
itunes:title: Lamar Jackson, Terrell Owens, Ezekiel Elliott, & the NFl helmet rule
description:
Colin discusses Baltimore Ravens QB Lamar Jackson's performance on Thursday, how Hall of Fame WR Terrell Owens will be remembered, why the Dallas Cowboys should be concerned about RB Ezekiel Elliott, and his thoughts on the NFL's new helmet rule. Guests include Greg Cosell, Eric Mangini, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
